Authors: Taimy Cantillo , Luis Gusm?, Hugo Madrid
Title: Periconia caespitosa sp. nov.
Abstract:
A new species of the fungal genus Periconia, P.
caespitosa, is described from decaying leaves in Brazil based on DNA
sequence data and morphology. This fungus is morphologically similar to
P. clitoriae Subram. Conidiophores in P. clitoriae, however, are smooth,
shorter and narrower than those of the novel species.
